Title: Jharkhand BJP MP moots LS seats for PoK
Content: BJP MP from Godda, Jharkhand, Nishikant Dubey has asked the Central government to introduce a Bill in Parliament introducing Lok Sabha constituencies from Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK) since a parl
Author: Nistula Hebbar
Description: BJP MP from Godda, Jharkhand, Nishikant Dubey has asked the Central government to introduce a Bill in Parliament introducing Lok Sabha constituencies from Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK) since a parl
